=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Argan Oil Shampoo and Conditioner Set - Sulfate Free All Natural Hair Repair Treatment, Clarifying Volumizing & Moisturizing, Color Safe, Gentle for Curly & Color Treated Hair Gift Set (2x 8oz)
Review Date: 2017/05/14
Store: Premium Nature
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'Premium Nature', 'Hair Type': 'Curly,Damaged,All,Straight,Color Treated', 'Special Ingredients': 'Vitamin-e,Jojoba-oil,Almond-oil,Peach,Argan-oil,Camellia-oil'}
Review Text: I have been using this shampoo and conditioner set only briefly. Nevertheless, it smells pleasant, it didn't leave my hair tangled, or oily. It left my hair with a lot of body, and very soft. Of course, time will tell as to how my hair hold up in the long run. For the time being however… I am very  pleased.
Review Title: So far I am very satisfied.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Hippie Honey Scrub Exfoliant Facial Cleanser by Hippie Skin
Hippie Skin
['A gentle, invigorating cleanser that sloughs away dead skin, fights bacteria, and leaves skin soft and vibrant. Formulated with essential oils that support aging skin, this cleanser is a must have for a natural daily routine! SCENT: Lavender and honey, yum! INGREDIENT SUPERSTARS: Raw Honey - antioxidant, antibacterial and antiinflammatory properties support reduced scarring and promote skin regeneration. The natural sugar crystallization and glycolic acid contained in raw honey gently sloughs away dead skin cells, promoting cleaner, healthier skin. Lavender Essential Oil: Promotes skin healing, reduces redness and promotes blood circulation, which provides more oxygen and nutrients to the skin. Carrot Seed Essential Oil: Promotes skin health through antiseptic properties. Tightens pores and skin to combat sagging skin and fine lines. DIRECTIONS: Massage onto face with upward circular motions and rinse well with warm water. Recommended for all skin types.']
{'Brand': 'Hippie Skin', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Dry, Normal', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 2.36 x 2.68 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '865233000117', 'Manufacturer': 'Hippie Skin'}
The scrub has a creamy texture and smell strongly of honey.  It applies easily to the skin, and rinses off without effort.  My skin feels soft after use, and it has helped with my break-outs

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preferences:** Prefers natural skincare products with gentle formulations, as well as hair care items that are sulfate-free and designed for various hair types, particularly focusing on moisture and repair.

- **Scent Preferences:** Enjoys products with pleasant and calming scents, with a specific affinity for honey and lavender in skincare, and appreciation for pleasant aromas in hair care products.

- **Skin and Hair Types:** Interested in products suitable for a range of skin and hair types, indicating a preference for versatility and effectiveness across different conditions.

- **Texture Preferences:** Favors creamy textures in skincare and liquid formats in hair care that are easy to apply, rinse off, and enhance overall user experience.

- **Usage Focus:** Looks for cleansers that not only cleanse the skin but also contribute to skin regeneration and softness, while also seeking hair products that add body and softness without leaving residues.

- **Review Tendencies:** Leaves constructive feedback, emphasizing effectiveness and sensory experiences, while also being mindful about long-term performance and areas for improvement.

- **Natural Ingredients:** Strong preference for formulations that feature natural ingredients providing additional skin and hair benefits, such as moisturizing and repairing properties.

Overall, the user leans towards holistic, effective, and sensory-friendly solutions in both skincare and hair care, while maintaining a critical eye for product performance and quality.
